attributes.action: Raise for discussion with intent to pass into law that skills, jobs, corporate functions e.g. Help Desks, for UK based companies may not be outsourced to other countries especially 3rd world countries and especially when the reason is merely lower salaries abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not acceptable that to raise a question about my mortgage, utility bills etc; my enquiry will be referred to an individual in a distant country. It is effectively exporting work to other countries and it is infuriating to know that my personal data is held on a server in some data centre in; e.g.; Bangalore, and my enquiry is being handled by someone with little or no knowledge of my culture and other factors relating to my issues.
